byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer and Michael M. Grynbaum contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: New York State lawmakers approve much-delayed, wide-ranging deal that includes four-year extension of rent regulations, education and other affairs.
lead_paragraph: The much-delayed deal includes a four-year extension of rental rules, funding for nonpublic schools and other matters.

headline.main: Wide-Ranging Deal Approved as Albany Session Closes
headline.print_headline: Wide-Ranging Deal Approved as Albany Ends Session

snippet: The much-delayed deal includes a four-year extension of rental rules, funding for nonpublic schools and other matters.
